title: Games industry M & A transactions cumulative value worldwide 2010 to 2016
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Value in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012 to 2010.
gold: This statistic shows the Cumulative value of games market mergers and acquisitions ( M & A ) worldwide from 2010 to 2016 . In 2015 , based on the values of disclosed transactions , the industry 's M & A deals amounted to 4.36 billion U.S. dollars .
